description: I recently joined Codoyens as an Angular & .NET Developer, starting with a 3-month probation period. This opportunity allows me to work across full-stack development, contributing to dynamic projects and furthering my career growth in a collaborative and professional environment.

At Xera Marketing, I started as a Frontend Developer Intern and was later promoted to Junior Frontend Developer. During my time there, I worked extensively with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, contributing to real-world projects and improving my technical and team collaboration skills. This experience laid a solid foundation for my frontend development expertise.
